thread.section_title: Villa Beaumarchais - UPDATED 2016 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Cozy is the word
thread.title_full: Cozy is the word - Review of Villa Beaumarchais, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: BudiMohdYunus
title: Cozy is the word
text:
I had the pleasure of staying for 2 nights, and it was just like the pictures. Cozy, oldschool charm. Like going back to your grandmother's. Room was clean and perfect, on the ground floor, so view was a little sad. Apart from that, the bed was plump and snuggly, plenty of pillows and very quiet.
Few metro stations near by, easyto get around.
Room Tip: Ask for top floor rooms. See more room tips
